flawed_nl_solution:
It will take 3 * 5 = <<3*5=15>>15 minutes to brush his cats.
All together, it will take 45 + 60 + 30 + 15 = <<45+60+30+15=105>>105 minutes to clean his apartment.
In three hours, there are 60 * 3 = <<60*3=180>>180 minutes.
Thus, he will have 180 - 105 = <<180-105=75>>75 minutes of free time remaining.
#### 75

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 105. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
